allow:
Bash(FILTER_BRANCH_SQUELCH_WARNING=1 git filter-branch -f --msg-filter '
if [ ""$GIT_COMMIT"" = ""86b4cae6fc4c62d2dc74ce53109b19c7795678c8"" ]; then
  cat << NEWMSG
Willow v1.0: Steganographic encoding layer

- SEED.md: Project initialization and structure
- schema/encoding.md: Unicode homoglyph substitution spec
- tools/codec.py: Encoder/decoder with encode, decode, detect commands
- keys/distribution.log: Key distribution tracking template

Encoding uses Unicode homoglyph variants to hide base-4 encoded
payloads in visually identical text.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
NEWMSG
else
  cat
fi
' -- --all)
Bash(for f in CONTRIBUTOR_PROTOCOL NAMING_PROTOCOL THE_ELEVEN_PRINCIPLE GOVERNANCE_INDEX AUTONOMY_BENCHMARK RESEARCH_THRESHOLD)
Bash(powershell -Command "\(Get-Content categorize.py\) -replace ""''web site'': ''Text'', ''monitor'': ''Text'',"", ""''web site'': ''Text'',"" | Set-Content categorize.py")

Bash(powershell -Command "\(Get-Content categorize.py -Raw\) -replace ''except:\\r?\\n    print\\\(""Warning: Could not download labels.""\\\)'', ''except Exception:\\n    print\(""Warning: Could not download labels.""\)'' | Set-Content categorize.py -NoNewline")
